Andy Buckley https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Andy_Buckley 0 Andrew P. Buckley Jr. (born February 13, 1965) is an American actor, screenwriter, and stockbroker. He is best known for his role as David Wallace on the American comedy series The Office from 2006 to 2013. Andrew_P._Buckley_Jr . ( born February_13_,_1965_) is an_American_actor , screenwriter , and stockbroker . He is_best_known for his_role as David_Wallace on the_American_comedy_series The_Office from 2006 to 2013 .
